entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:04 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 01:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
